news.description: Clark Morrison of Cox, Castle & Nicholson LLP was quoted by Globe St. about EPA’s new rule on wetlands and other water features under the Clean Water Act
Michael Burrell of Adelman Hirsch & Connors was mentioned on Yahoo! Finance’s “5 Lawyers Who Won Big in 2018”
Pillsbury Winthrop Shaw Pittman was mentioned in this BNA article among the firms that discuss clients having the right to choose their counsel in Howrey Trustee case.

Howard Hershenhorn and Diana M. A. Carnemolla from Gair, Gair, Conason, Rubinowitz, Bloom, Hershenhorn, Steigman & Mackauf obtain record setting $85 million verdict for New York pedestrian run over by double decker.
